text: With a Song In My Heart is Stevie Wonder's third album, released in 1963 on the Tamla label. The album was the first album of Wonder's not to be released as "Little Stevie Wonder" because he was getting older and taller. It was also the second album of Wonder's to be released in 1963. ==Track listing== #"With a Song in My Heart" (Lorenz Hart, Richard Rodgers) – 3:11 #"When You Wish Upon a Star" (Ned Washington, Leigh Harline) – 2:59 #"Smile" (Charlie Chaplin, Geoffrey Parsons, John Turner) – 3:20 #"Make Someone Happy" (Betty Comden, Adolph Green, Jule Styne) – 5:04 #"Dream" (Johnny Mercer) – 2:50 #"Put on a Happy Face" (Charles Strouse, Lee Adams) – 2:37 #"On the Sunny Side of the Street" (Dorothy Fields, Jimmy McHugh) – 3:58 #"Get Happy" (Harold Arlen, Ted Koehler) – 2:12 #"Give Your Heart a Chance" (Ron Miller, Orlando Murden, O'Neil) – 2:16 #"Without a Song" (Edward Eliscu, Billy Rose, Vincent Youmans) – 4:14 ==References== Category:1963 albums Category:R&B; albums Category:Soul albums Category:Jazz albums
title: With a Song in My Heart (Stevie Wonder album)
